question: There were two Narasimham Committees. Narasimham Committee -I was formed in 1991 and Narasimham Committee -II was formed in 1998. In this context, which among the following statements is correct?
option1: First Narsimhmam Committee was related to Tax Reforms and Second Narsimhmam Committee was related to Banking Reforms
option2: First as well as Second Narsimhmam Committees were related to Tax Reforms
option3: First as well as Second Narsimhmam Committees were related to Banking Reforms
option4: First Narsimhmam Committee was related to Banking Reforms and Second Narsimhmam Committee was related to Tax Reforms
answer: First as well as Second Narsimhmam Committees were related to Banking Reforms
